name: Change Gaia Online Header
description: This changes the background of the header. The Default is the Gauntlets and Goblins RIG header, but you can change it to whatever you want.
additional_info:
*Suggested header image size is 970x150.
*I have no idea if this works on any browser other then Firefox. If it doesn't and there is enough complaining I'll look into fixing it to make it cross browser friendly.
